name: Cadori
description:
Cadori was developed as an entry for Ludum Dare #35 and designed around the theme "Shapeshift". Two players are tasked with taking control of a pair of vampires and battling by way of dash attacks and light exposure.

Keyboard Controls (P1)
WASD Keys: Movement
Left Control: Shapeshift
Left Shift: Bat Dash

Keyboard Controls (P2)
Arrow Keys: Movement
Right Control: Shapeshift
Right Shift: Bat Dash

Controller Controls
Left Stick: Movement
B Button: Shapeshift
A Button: Bat Dash
